name: Bo3lwah
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May Allah always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! I hope all your birthdays are great, all your years are fun, and that every dream you follow is as incredble as you! Yeee! MY best best best bestieeeeee <3333
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it (imma kill you if u didnt).
replayText: Or click, if you want to rewatch.
